open_rule1: agg.distance_200 > 3 and res[0].RSI_14 > 75 and res[0].numTrades > 50 and agg.bb_size > 1 and agg.empty_count < 1 and agg.atrp_equal == 10 and (res[0].STOCHRSI_8[0] > 90 and res[0].STOCHRSI_8[1] > 90) and res[0].low > res[0].bb_200[1]
open_rule2: res[0].high < res[0].bb_200[0] and res[0].bbperc_200 > 2 and res[0].numTrades > 50 and res[0].RSI_14 > 80 and res[0].close > res[0].open and res[1].close > res[1].open and res[2].close > res[2].open and agg.candle_size > agg.avg_candles and res[0].open > res[0].bb_200[0] and agg.empty_count < 1 and agg.atrp_equal == 10 and (res[0].STOCHRSI_8[0] > 90 and res[0].STOCHRSI_8[1] > 90) and res[0].low > res[0].bb_200[1]
open_rule3: agg.bbperc_diff > 2 and res[0].bbperc_200 > 2 and res[0].numTrades > 50 and agg.empty_count < 1 and agg.atrp_equal == 10 and (res[0].STOCHRSI_8[0] > 90 and res[0].STOCHRSI_8[1] > 90) and res[0].low > res[0].bb_200[1]
open_rule4: res[0].bbperc_200 > 4.5 and res[0].numTrades > 50 and agg.empty_count < 1 and agg.atrp_equal == 10 and (res[0].STOCHRSI_8[0] > 90 and res[0].STOCHRSI_8[1] > 90) and res[0].low > res[0].bb_200[1]
